high_descs: Turn around and walk to the right of the blue bed.
Pick up the phone on the wooden desk next to the blue bed.
Look up on the upper shelf of the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the phone and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: head across the room to the desk
take the white cell phone from the desk
anns.task_desc: Take the cell phone from the desk, turn on the lamp

high_descs: Turn to your right and go to the wooden desk in the right corner of the bedroom.
Pick up the cell phone, in front of the keys on the desk.
Move closer to the desk so you can reach the top shelf.
Turn on the lamp on the top, left shelf of the desk.
